0.title: Can not connect to server
0.message: Could not establish a connection to the server.
0.desc: If you are experiencing this problem, it may be because the server is having problems or your computer cannot access the internet.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.message: You do not have permission to access this resource.
401.desc: The 401 Unauthorized error appears when you try to access a resource that requires authentication, but your credentials are invalid or do not exist.

403.title: Forbidden access (Forbidden)
403.message: You do not have access to this resource.
403.desc: Error 403 Forbidden appears when you try to access a resource without permission.

408.title: Request timed out
408.message: Your request has exceeded the server's maximum timeout.
408.desc: Error 408 Request Timeout appears when your request does not receive a response from the server within the specified maximum waiting time.

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.message: An unexpected error occurred on the server.
500.desc: Error 500 Internal Server Error appears when the server has an internal problem and cannot process your request.

404Page.title: Page Not Found
404Page.message: The page you are looking for does not exist.
404Page.desc: The error occurs when you request to access a page that does not exist on the server.

404Api.title: Function is stopped
404Api.message: The function you are trying to access is currently down.

invalidToken.title: Login session expired
invalidToken.desc: Your session has expired, please log in to continue
